correctness.rationale: While some items match the article (thermal ALD for In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO; precursors TMIn/TMGa/DEZn with O3; 250 °C deposition; 5:2:1 supercycle; film thickness ~4.2 nm; AFM roughness 0.306 nm; Ion/off > 1e9; μ_FE ~11.68 cm2/V·s), many values are incorrect, untraceable, or violate the schema. Key issues: (1) Schema violation: plasmaPower is set to null; if TALD, this field should be omitted or provided as a valid object. (2) Untraceable/guessed process parameters: pressure (10 mmHg), carrierGas and purgingGas (N2), deliveryMethod, growthPerCycle for each oxide, saturation, nucleationPeriod, dosingTime, purgeTime, and flowRates are not reported in the article. (3) numberofCycles is set to 12 but the article states 12 supercycles of a 5:2:1 sequence (total ALD cycles should be 12×(5+2+1)=96 if this field represents total cycles per schema). (4) supercycleSequence order is not stated in the article. (5) Material properties largely fabricated: refractiveIndex, absorptionCoefficient, bandGap (and “Tauc plot”), resistivity, carrierDensity (and ‘Hall’ method), uniformity, conformality, crystallinity by XRD, and filmDensity (also wrong QUDT unit for g/cm3; GM-PER-DeciM3 corresponds to g/L). (6) Film composition: elementalConcentration reported as a single 24% value is not a correct multi-element concentration; only the atomic ratio 0.24:0.58:0.18 via XPS is supported. (7) Device properties: thresholdVoltage is incorrectly set to −1.12 V; the article reports VT ≈ +1.12 V (1 µm TG) and −0.75/−0.88 V (150 nm TG). DeviceStructure is mislabeled as “bottom-gate top-contact” although the devices are dual-gate with a top Al2O3 gate dielectric. Corrections needed: remove/reshape plasmaPower; remove or mark unknown any unreported timing/flow/pressure/carrier values; set numberofCycles to the total ALD cycles (96) or clearly represent supercycles; restrict material properties to those reported (e.g., AFM roughness, XPS composition) and correct units; fix VT values and deviceStructure; provide per-element concentrations if available or omit elementalConcentration in favor of the reported atomic ratio.

completeness.rationale: Significant incompleteness and multiple schema/factual issues. (1) Multiple distinct IGZO ALD processes described in the article (different sub-cycle ratios 5:1:1, 5:2:1, 5:1:3 with different resulting thicknesses 3.2, 4.2, 4.3 nm) are not represented as separate processes; only the 5:2:1 case is extracted. (2) Several parameters are fabricated and not traceable to the article: reactor pressure, carrier/purging gas, dosing and purge times, flow rates, nucleation period, saturation flag, delivery method, growth-per-cycle, optical properties, uniformity and conformality metrics, resistivity, carrier density, film density, and crystallinity/XRD. (3) Schema violations/inconsistencies: plasmaPower is set to null (not allowed); numberofCycles is incorrect (set to 12, whereas 12 supercycles with 5:2:1 imply at least 96 total sub-cycles; article explicitly states 60 In2O3 cycles); filmComposition.elementalConcentration is incomplete (single 24% value without full elemental list); deviceProperties.thresholdVoltage is wrong (−1.12 V is inconsistent with reported VT values: +1.12/+1.05 V at Lch=1 µm top-gate, and −0.75/−0.88 V at Lch=150 nm); deviceStructure is inaccurate for a dual-gate device (reported structure includes both HfO2 bottom gate dielectric and Al2O3 top gate). (4) Some included values are only valid for IGZO/Al2O3 bilayer, not bare IGZO (roughness 0.306 nm). (5) Supercycle sequence order is asserted without support from the text. To improve: add separate process instances for each IGZO composition; correct numberofCycles; remove or justify unreported parameters (or leave optional fields absent); fix VT and deviceStructure; limit film properties to those reported (e.g., composition by XPS, AFM roughness with correct context); remove null plasmaPower; ensure all values are traceable to the article.
